job.title: Autonomy/AI Machine Learning Research Engineer
job.description:
Focuses on research & development of technologies that enable and advance semi and fully
autonomous systems for both defense and commercial customers. Serves as the algorithm expert
working to enhance machine learning and robotic algorithms. Investigates, optimizes, and applies upto-
date knowledge on modern AI research with latest machine learning and deep learning techniques.
Develops algorithm implementation requirements. Develops prototypes and may be involved in the
inception of ideas and drive the development cycles from research to test of prototypes for a major
project or component of a major project.
systems
solve a variety of problems
motion planning, simulation and modeling, testing, etc.
